113.content:
"I told you, bat-girl! The Master Emerald stays where it is!"

"And I told you, Knucklehead, all the world's gems belong to me; including your emerald!"

Sonic turned and saw Knuckles and Rouge, fighting as usual. The huntress had both hands on her hips and was smirking cheekily, while her opponent had both fists clenched and looked ready to start a fight. Sonic smirked and pressed the button.

There was a flash and when the light cleared, Sonic had to hold in his laughter when he saw Knuckles with Rouge's clothes, makeup and feminine posture, facing Rouge who was devoid of makeup, wearing only Knuckles' gloves and shoes, and looked really pissed off.

"That does it!" the new guardian yelled in an uncharacteristically gruff manner as she lunged at Knuckles, who elegantly evaded the blow.

"Well, then, if you're going to be like that, I'd best take my leave." said Knuckles, his deep voice sounding strange with Rouge's seductive tone. He turned and walked in the blue hedgehog's direction, his hips swaying and his high heels clicking. Sonic tried not to laugh and moved out of his former rival's way politely.

"Now see, your friend knows how to treat a lady." Knuckles teased. Sonic would've burst out laughing then and there, if Knuckles hadn't lent over and kissed him on the cheek, leaving a pink lipstick mark. The blue blur almost fell over in shock, as GUN's newest agent winked and trotted off.

Sonic was snapped out of his trance by a very unladylike growl. "The nerve of her..." snarled Rouge.
113.title: Knuckles and Rouge

While Sonic was flying he spotted Angel Island and more importantly the Master Emerald. Sonic couldn't help but stare at it: it was a beautiful green color with it's sparkling surface and alluring aura around it.

'No wonder Rouge is always trying to steal it.' Sonic thought in wonder. He soon spotted the emerald's guardian Knuckles the Enchidna asleep on top said emerald. With a sly grin on his face Sonic flew down to the island and on top of the emerald. Sonic couldn't help but stare at Knuckles and think at how cute he looked when he was asleep. Deciding to have a little fun Sonic poked Knuckles cheek.

"Wakey wakey, sleepy head." Sonic said teasingly. Since Knuckles eyes were closed and Sonic having Rouge's voice Knuckles just figured it was Rouge trying to get the emerald again.

"Leave me alone bat-girl." Knuckles said while swatting away Sonic's hand.

"Is that anyway to treat your best friend?" Sonic said jokingly.

"You're not my friend Rouge. You're not even my ally for that matter." Knuckles said starting to get annoyed.

"Who ever said I was Rouge?"

"How can it not be--" Knuckles stopped dead when he opened his eyes to instead of seeing Rouge he saw Sonic wearing Rouge's clothing and make-up. He jumped back so far he fell of the Master Emerald and landed on the ground with a loud thud. Sonic looked down on the ground and found Knuckles sprawled on the ground unconscious due to the fall. He jumped off and layed on Knuckles and put her head to his chest to see if he was still breathing: he was. Deciding on waking him he flicked nose a couple of times and it did the trick. Knuckles came back to consciousness to find Sonic right on top of him.

"Get off me!" He yelled pushing Sonic off him with blush on his cheeks.

"Well excuse me! Is that how you should talk to the person who saved you from a potential concussion."

"You're the one who caused me to fall in the first place!"

"Hmph fine! I know when I'm not wanted!" He said about to take-off but before he could even get 5 feet from the ground a strong hand grabbed his leg. He turned his head to see Knuckles holding his leg with a sorry look on his face. Hee lands on the ground and walks over to Knuckles.

"Sonic don't leave. Look I'm sorry about yelling at you, I'm just really surprised that you have Rouge's clothing, make-up and among 'other' things" He said while staring at his chest. Not noticing that Sonic walked over to the Master Emerald.

Sonic....

A few moments later, he was standing outside the Thorndyke Mansion. Quick as a flash, he ran up to his friend, Chris' room. He knew that both Chris and Tails would be in there.

True enough, as Sonic entered the room, he saw that both the Mobian fox and the human boy were standing at the table looking at one of Tails' new devices.

"Hey, guys!" Sonic called out. Both of his friends turned to look at him.

"Hey, Sonic," said Chris.

"What's up, Sonic?" asked Tails.

Sonic told them about the remote he had found. "...and that's why I came to you guys with it. Since you are both into science, I thought you might want to be the first to try out the remote."

"I dunno, Sonic," said Tails. "I find it hard to imagine that that remote is capable of all those things. It sounds more like one of Eggman's tricks, if you ask me."

"Oh, come on, Tails," said Chris. "What if it's not a trick? I for one would be amazed if it turned out to be genuine. Plus, I've always wondered what it would be like to be you."

Tails sighed. Then he said: "Well, my studies of human culture and educational evolution might be easier to finish, if I could actually BE a human."

"Then it's settled!" said Chris exitedly. "Press the button, Sonic!"

"You got it!" said Sonic, as he did as instructed. As soon as he pushed the button, a beam of light came out and hit both Tails and Chris.

What happens?
155312222222222221.title: Swapping the bodies of Sonic's two best buddies

choices: Chris, in Tails' body, about to start working on the X-Tornado
Tails, in Chris' body, about to start the school-day
1553122222222222211.content:
As the light from the remote faded, Chris blinked the stars out of his eyes. The flash had taken him by surprise, so he had all his focus on being able to see again.

When he could see again, the first thing he noticed was that Sonic, and the bedroom, seemed to be bigger. That gor Chris' attention right away; he was usually bigger than Sonic was. Could it be, that....?

Chris got confirmation of this, when he looked down at himself. Exept, he wasn't exactly 'himself' anymore; instead of looking at his normal twelve-year-old human body, he was looking at a yellow-furred body, wearing only white gloves and red-and-white shoes!

No doubt about it; he was now in Tails' body!!!!!

This was further confirmed to Chris when he looked to his left and saw his own body looking at itself and it's hands, in surprise and curiosity. Chris was certain that meant that Tails was now inside his human body!

"Judging by your reactions, I'd say it worked, right?" asked Sonic. Chris was startled; the shock of swapping bodies with Tails had almost caused him to forget that Sonic was there too.

"I'll say," exclaimed Chris. That's when they discovered another surprising thing...

"Now that's an interesting development," said Tails in Chris' body. "Appearently, we still kept our own voices when we swapped bodies. I'd surmise that it's some sort of safety protocol, so that we don't forget who's been swapped with who."

"Could be," said Sonic.

Chris was only partially listening. He was more occupied with the fact, that he had just heard Tails' voice coming out of his own body. In fact, this whole situation was just incredibly surreal to him! He snapped out of it when Tails turned his -Chris'- eyes towards him and asked:

"Hey, are you alright? You seem so quiet."

"Sorry about that," said Chris. "I guess I was just weirded out a bit over the fact that that funny remote that Sonic found actually worked. Well, that, and the fact that I'm currently in your body, Tails."

"I know exactly what you mean," said Tails. "This is strange for me too."

"So, guys," said Sonic. "What's it like to be each other?"

"It feels really weird," said Chris, as he thoroughly looked at Tails' body, that he now inhabited. "For one thing, Tails' body is much smaller than my own, so I'm not as tall as I'm used to. Also, I'm not really comfortable having all of this fur."

As he said that, Chris used Tails' body's hands to better feel his new body. "It feels really itchy and hot at the same time." Chris looked behind him, at his two new tails. "These tails are also hard to get used to. It's almost like having two hyper-mobile arms attached to my butt. Plus, I'm having difficulties actually moving them the way I want to."

Indeed; the tails were clearly moving around haphazardly. It didn't look like Chris had much control over how to move them around properly. This was further demonstrated, when one of the tails hit Chris in the face as he looked at them, causing a few giggles from Sonic and Tails.

Ignoring the laughs, Chris continued: "Finally, I'm not quite comfortable with only wearing these shoes and gloves." Blushing slightly, Chris attempted to cover as much of his -Tails'- body as possible, with his -Tails'- arms. "I feel so naked in this body."

"You really don't have to, Chris," said Tails. "It's quite normal for us male Mobians to only wear that much. Everything else is covered up by the fur." Tails looked down at Chris' body, which he mow occupied, before he continued.

"It's somewhat the opposite with me, but no less weird. I'm not used to being so tall, I feel cold without my fur, and it feels weird not having my tails anymore."

Tails gently tugged on Chris' shirt. "Another strange thing for me, is that I have to wear so many clothes. I didn't need to do that in my regular body. It's weird to have to wear them, in place of my fur." Tails sighed. "No offence, Chris, but being a human is weird."

"None taken," replied Chris. "I'm in the same position as you, after all."

"Hey, Tails!" exclaimed Sonic. "I just remembered; since you are now in Chris' body, you've actually gotten older! You are only eight years old, while Chris is twelve!"

"Hey, you're right!" said Tails. "Wow! Talk about a growth spurt!"

"Aw, man!" said Chris. "So not only am I in Tails' body, but I got younger too! I'm not sure if this is what's meant by 'a second childhood'!"

Any further talking was interrupted by the television. It showed several robots on a rampage downtown.

"Eggman never gives up, does he?" smirked Sonic. "Don't worry; I'll turn those robots into spare parts, before you can say 'hedgehog'!"

"Uh, Sonic?" asked Tails quickly. "Would you mind leaving the remote here? It's not that I doubt your skills, but I don't want the remote to break thanks to a lucky shot. It's the only thing that can swap me and Chris back to our own bodies, so I'd really like for it to be safe."

"Good point buddy," admitted Sonic. "We can't have that you guys get stuck in each others bodies permanently."

Sonic placed the remote on the table. A quarter of a second later, he had wooshed out to scrap the robots, leaving the body-swapped friends alone in the room.

"So, what do we do now?" asked Chris.

"First of all, we should make sure that the remote is safely locked away," answered Tails. "We don't want anything to happen to it, like I said. Not until we need to swap back, at least."

Tails walked over to the table, but he stumbled before he got there and fell down on the floor.

"Tails! Are you okay?" Chris cried out in alarm. He ran over to Tails, only to fall down himself.

"I'm fine," said Tails. "But it appears that we both have problems balancing in our new bodies. I'm not used to walking without having my tails and you're not used to walking with them."

Helping each other out, the body-swapped buddies eventually got their balancing acts sorted out; at least enough for Tails to be able to safely lock the remote inside a secret vault that he had installed for just such an emergency.

With the remote secure, Tails looked back at Chris and said: "So, how is it going getting used to my tails?"

"Well, it's moving forward," replied Chris, as he moved his new tails around. "It's still a weird feeling to even have them."

"Oh, I know," said Tails. "It's also quite a learning experience for me."

"Learning?!? Oh my gosh!!!" exclaimed Chris, looking at the watch on the wall. "I almost forgot; I'm late for school!"

Chris was about to hurry out the door when Tails stopped him.

"Wait a minute, Chris!" said Tails. "You're in my body for the moment, remember? You just can't go to school as you are now."

"But I need to be there!" complained Chris. "I've never taken a sick day in my life and I don't want to take one now!"

"Then I guess there's only one thing to do," said Tails. "Since I'm currently in your body, that means that I'll have to go to school instead of you; or should that be AS you."

"Not a good idea," said Chris. "You said yourself that you didn't feel comfortable being me. If you do something odd, my classmates might get suspicious. Your voice might even give it away! Besides, you also said that the X-Tornado needs a tune-up, and no one knows that plane better than you."

"Don't worry, Chris. I've got everything under control," reassured Tails. "If anyone should notice that 'your' voice sounds different, I'll just tell them that I have the beginnings of a cold. That will also explain any oddities that I might do in your body, since having a cold can hamper one's concentration. And I still want to study human culture. And the best way to do that, is for me to go to a school. And as far as the X-Tornado is concerned..."

Finding a piece of paper and a pencil, Tails quickly scribbled something down. Handing the paper over to Chris, Tails said: "Just follow these instructions and it'll be fine."

Looking first at the instructions and then at Tails, in his body, Chris sighed: "Okay, Tails. You can go to my school in my body."

"Yes!" cheered Tails.

"However," added Chris, "I don't want you to do anything that will make it seem like you aren't me."

"I promise," answered Tails. "Now, where's all of your school stuff?"

"Over there," said Chris and pointed at his backpack in the corner. "It's a good thing that I packed everything before I went up here, including the gym clothes."

"Yeah. Otherwise you... or should that be 'I'... would be even more late," said Tails, as he put on Chris' backpack.

"Just hurry!"

"Okay, see you after school!" called Tails, as he hurried downstairs. As soon as Tails had disappeared with his new body, Chris turned his attention to the note that Tails had written for him.

'Well,' thought Chris, 'I'd better go down to the garage and tune-up the X-Tornado. But first...'

Walking over to his closet, Chris took out a pair of shorts and a T-shirt that he had outgrown in his normal body.

'No offence, Tails, but I just can't stand walking around almost naked, even in your body.'

Chris had to use a pair of scissors to cut a hole for Tails' body's tails to go through. Once that was done, Chris put on the clothes, that fit Tails' body perfectly.

Feeling a bit more comfortable, Chris grabbed the instructions and walked down to the garage to start the work on the X-Tornado.

Meanwhile, Tails was sitting on the bus, on the way to Chris' school.

Which one of them should we follow?

Silver continued to giggle and burst out in laughter, until his doorbell rang. "Oh! Come in!" Silver shouted.
The door opened, and the click-clack of shoes could be heard on Silver's marble floors.
Silver nearly spat the chips and salsa he'd been chewing at the sight that greeted his eyes.
It was Blaze, in a outfit that consisted of a red midriff-exposing top, a tight heel-length red dress, and red high-heels.
"B-B-BLAZE!?" Silver exclaimed, his cheeks turning a bright crimson.
"Who else, Silver?" Blaze said, leaning closer to the astonished hedgehog.
"B-But what are you doing here?!" Silver said, obviously uncomfortable.
"What, Can't a girl get dressed up and visit her favorite hedgehog once in a while?" She said, placing her hand on her hip and smiling.
"But wh-why?" Silver said.
"Come on, Why don't you play with me for a little?" She said, leaning closer to Silver until they were face-to-face.
"W-wait, What?!" Silver said, multiple naughty images flashing through his mind.
"You heard me Honey, I'm ALL yours!" She replied in a seductive tone.
"A-all m-m-mine? Oh my...!" Silver said, before passing out with a large nosebleed.
"Wow, That was WAY easier than I expected!" Blaze exclaimed, standing up.
"Who would of thought that BLAZE of all people could be such an effective seductress?" The cat said, obviously impressed.
"It was a good idea to possess Blaze from the start!" She said, revealing herself to be Sonic having possessed the body of Blaze.
"Well, Silver's probably going to think this was just a dream when he wakes up, if he doesn't die from blood-loss first!" Sonic said, looking at the unconscious hedgehog in front of him.
"Well, I'd better go before he wakes up!" Sonic said, before leaving and closing the door.

155332222222222222211.title: His two best friends, Tails and Chris

1553322222222222222111.content:
Having gotten an amusing idea about what to do with the remote, Sonic hurried over to the Thorndyke Mansion. Once there, he ran up onto the roof and over to Chris' room's window.

Peeking inside, he saw Chris and Tails talking; no doubt about some kind of new invention Tails had made.

Grinning, Sonic found the setting on the remote that he was looking for, aimed at Chris and Tails, and pressed the button.

As soon as the beam hit them, both Chris and Tails fell to the floor. Grinning even more, Sonic watched the awkwardness about to unfold.

Which of the two friends wakes up first?
1553322222222222222111.title: Sonic zapping Chris and Tails

choices: After calming themselves down, Tails and Chris swap 'back'
Chris and Tails try to go on, in 'each others' clothes
15533222222222222221111.content:
Tails groaned as he slowly woke up. What happened? He had been talking to Chris, then there had been a bright flash and the next thing he knew, he was laying on the floor. For some reason, he felt cold too

Tails sat up, rubbing his gloved hand against his head, to ease the pain of hitting the floor a little.

Wait a second... A 'gloved' hand?

That woke Tails up right away. He'd never worn gloves before, so why was he wearing them now? Or was he just imagining things?

He opened his eyes to look. Well, he wasn't imagining things; he really was wearing a pair of white gloves with gray fasteners on his hands! The gloves seemed very familliar too...

Suddenly, he realized why they looked familliar; these were Chris' gloves! But how come he was wearing them and not Chris? It didn't make...

Tails' train of thought was interrupted, when he remembered how he had felt cold when he woke up. Coupled with the fact that he was wearing Chris' gloves, there could only be one conclusion...

Hoping that he was wrong for once, Tails slowly moved his gaze to look down at himself. Unfortunately, Tails was rarely wrong, and this time was no exeption.

Tails could do nothing but stare at himself in shock. HE WAS COMPLETLY NAKED!!! Well, almost. Apart from the gloves, the only articles of clothing on him, was a pair of white socks, also with gray fasteners, and a pair of red sneakers with white toes and gray soles. Other than that, he was buck-naked!

Tails had indeed been right; he was wearing all of Chris' clothes! Quickly standing up, Tails tried to cover as much of his semi-naked body as possible with his hands, blushing bright crimson in embarrasment.

"Waaaahhhh!!!" This outcry of shock sounded right next to Tails. He quickly turned around to see what was wrong.

Chris had woken up, too, and it was him that had let out that cry of shock. Tails couldn't blame him. After all, Chris was currently wearing HIS clothes!

A red short-sleaved shirt with white sleaves, a yellow collar, a yellow regtangle on the end of each of the sleaves and one on the front of the shirt; the long-sleaved dark-blue undershirt, with a turquise stripe running down the middle of each sleave; blue jeans with a turquise stripe above each of the knees; a green belt hanging off the edge of the jeans; white socks; and a pair of stylish blue and yellow shoes with gray soles and a turquise stripe running down the middle of the toes. All of it Tails' and currently worn by Chris!

Chris was just standing there like a statue and judging by the expression on his face, he was as shocked as Tails was. Turning his head towards Tails, Chris stuttered: "T-Tails! What's g-going on? Wh-why am I wearing your c-clothes? And how c-come you're w-wearing mine?!?"

"I h-have no idea, Chris!" stuttered Tails in reply, still blushing heavily and trying to cover as much of his body with his hands. "All I know is that there was a flash, and then I woke up wearing your clothes!"

"Yeah, that's what happened to me, too," said Chris.

What neither of them knew, was that they were in fact wearing their normal clothes all along and that Sonic, currently giggling like crazy outside the window, had swapped their perceptions on whose clothes belonged to whom with a special remote.

Continuing his laugther, Sonic thought: 'This remote is amazing! Even though Tails and Chris are wearing their regular clothes, this remote has made them think that they are actually wearing each others! This is almost too funny! I can have loads of fun with this thing!'

Stopping his giggles, Sonic looked in the window again and thought: 'I wonder how those two will react next...'
15533222222222222221111.title: Tails and Chris in each others clothes... or not!

choices: He swaps Chris and Tails' perceptions back, then tells them about the remote.
He leaves Chris and Tails as they are, and find someone else to swap..
155332222222222222211111.content:
There was no denying that Chris and Tails both felt uncomfortable. Not surprising, considering that they thought they were wearing each others clothes.

Tails was probably the most uncomfortable of the two of them. He fidgeted nervously around, still trying to cover himself up as much as possible with his hands, without having much success.

'This is ridiculous!' he thought. 'How can Chris possibly handle walking around, just wearing gloves, socks and sneakers? It doesn't make any sense to me!'

Looking down at his near-naked body, Tails continued his train of thought. 'I also don't understand how Sonic can wear only this much. I guess he and Chris have one more thing in common.'

Finally realizing the futility of trying to cover himself with just his hands, Tails instead focused on Chris' clothes, that he currently wore.

'Maybe it's just because I'm not used to wearing them, but it feels so weird to wear gloves,' thought Tails, as he gently tugged on Chris' gloves. 'It's like my hands are imprisoned, or something like that.'

'His socks and sneakers aren't much better,' he thought, as he lifted one of his feet to get a better look at the sock and the sneaker. 'They feel so uncomfortable in comparison to my regular socks and shoes. Of course, it doesn't make it better, that that, and the gloves, is the ONLY clothes that he wears!'

Blushing again, Tails once more tried, in vain, to cover himself as much as he could with his hands. 'I'd much prefer to wear my own clothes, instead of these!' Tails sighed. 'At least I'm not the only one who's uncomfortable right now,' thought Tails, at he shifted his eyes from himself, and over to Chris.

Indeed; Chris was also feeling very uncomfortable at the moment, but for the exact opposite reason. Unlike Tails, who was uncomfortable being almost naked, Chris was uncomfortable wearing much more clothing than he was used to.

'I just don't get it!' thought Chris, as he too fidgeted nervously. 'How can Tails possibly move around wearing all of this? I don't know how he can stand it!'

Chris was looking down at himself, to better look at Tails' clothes, all of which he was now wearing.

'I'm not used to wearing so many clothes; all I've ever needed was my gloves and my sneakers,' thought Chris, as he gently tugged on Tails' clothes. 'So it feels really strange to me, to wear all of this.'

'Take this shirt, for instance,' thought Chris, as he carefully pulled on Tails' shirt to better look at it. 'It feels very stuffy and constricting on my torso. I find it really uncomfortable, to be honest.'

'It's the same thing with the jeans,' thought Chris, as he gently tugged on Tails' jeans too. 'They feel really weird to wear. They cover up my legs completely; I feel like I can barely move with them on!'

'Finally; there's the shoes,' he thought, as he lifted one foot to look at the shoe on it. 'They aren't nearly as comfortable as my own sneakers. These shoes are much too stiff for my liking.' Chris sighed. 'I don't get how Tails can possibly handle wearing all these clothes every day. I'd much prefer to just wear my gloves, socks and sneakers.'

Chris looked over at Tails and saw that he was looking at him. He'd obviously checked out Chris' clothes, just like he himself had checked out Tails' clothes.

"So," started Tails, "do you want to swap our clothes back now?"

"Yes, please," answered Chris, as he began removing Tails' over- and under-shirts from his body. "No offence, but I really don't want to wear your clothes for much longer."

"No offence taken," said Tails, as he took off Chris' sneakers.

No further words were spoken between them, until Chris had removed Tails' jeans. That was when they discovered that Chris was also wearing Tails' underwear! After a bit of grossing out, they went back to the task at hand.

When they had removed all of the clothes, leaving them both fully in the nude, they handed the clothes over to each other.

Chris was the first to get re-dressed, since he only had to put on his socks, sneakers and gloves. Although he was now nearly naked, he didn't mind since he thought that this was how he normally dressed.

It took a bit longer for Tails, since he had many more articles of clothing to put on. Naturally, he started with the underwear. Because of his two tails, he couldn't wear the tighty-whities like they should, but he managed to do it by letting the back edge of the underpants stop right as they touched the underside of his tails. This caused the underpants to be a little loose on him, but he still managed to get them to fit, without sliding off of him.

When it came to the long-sleaved undershirt, Tails actually had to roll up the sleaves slightly to fit his arms through them. Plus; since the undershirt was human-sized, it was so big on Tails' body, that the back of the undershirt was actually hanging over the base of his tails, showing off his underwear in the process.

Next came the jeans. Tails not only had to roll up the legs of the jeans in order to wear them, but he also had to put both of his tails through the space between the belt and the jeans, so as not to have them slide off of him too.

Tails then put on the short-sleaved shirt. It was the same deal as with the undershirt, exept for the fact that he didn't have to roll up the sleaves this time.

Finally, there was only the footwear left. The socks and shoes was easy for Tails to put on. When that was done, Tails turned towards Chris.

"This is much better, don't you think?" Tails asked, as he smoothed out a wrinkle in 'his' shirt.

"Indeed it is, Tails," replied Chris, as he adjusted 'his' gloves.

Neither of them was aware that they were actually wearing each others clothes.

And all the while Sonic was in silent hysterics right outside the window.

What will Sonic do next?
155332222222222222211111.title: Clothing Chaos

info.brief_description: A Sonic character finds a remote with strange powers.
info.description:
While walking through the forest, Sonic finds a swapping remote. It has buttons for life swap, two kinds of head swap, body part swap, as well as many others. It also has settings for who will notice that things have changed: the user, the targets, or everybody else; each can be turned on or off. How will he use his new toy?

I don't really care about continuity, so feel free to use any characters from any source- games, TV, comics, whatever. No crossovers with other series, though.

Long strings of Yes/No choices are unavoidable with the current system, but try to keep them to a minimum. If you have an idea for a specific direction you want the story to go, go ahead and write it; if not, don't. If the option you want has already been taken, get in touch with me and I'll try to fit something in.
